// golfing 567 chars  2015 shader https://shadertoy.com/view/4lXSWl


#define H(v) fract(4e4*sin(dot( v+R*I, vec2(13.46,41.74))+17.34))             // hash(seed),I=cellId
    
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 U )
{
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy, I,
         m = iMouse.z>0. ?  iMouse.xy : R * (.5+.5*sin(.1*iTime+vec2(0,33))); // mouse control or demo mode
    U.x -= 8.* (m.x - R.x/2. );                                               // translate
    U /= ( 1. - m.y/R.y ) *4.;                                                // zoom
    
    for (int i; i++ < 16; ) {                                                 // browse LODs
        I = ceil(U/R)-.5;                                                     // cell id
        if ( H() < .2+.2*sin(iTime) ) break;                                  // random depth
        R[ H(.1) < .5 ? 0 : 1 ] /= 3.;                                        // random dir of subdiv
    }
    
    U = R/2. - abs( U - R*I );                                                // coord relative to border
    O = min(U.x,U.y) < 2. ? vec4(0)                                           // border
             : H(.2) < .8 ? vec4(1)                                           // bg
             :              cos(6.3*H(1.) +vec4(0,21,23,0));                  // colored leaf
}
